Node lc's depth is 5.

According to the input, the depth of node j is 0, and the depth of node k is 1. Node k has a child node l, and the depth of node l is 2. Node l has two children, m and n, and the depth of node l is 3. Node l also has two more children, o and p, so the depth of node l becomes 4. Then, node l has a child q, and the depth of node q is 5. Finally, node q has child nodes r, s, t, and u, all with depth 5.

Therefore, the depth of node lc is 5.
